1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Meet the Li family - the scheming father, three busy daugthers, and one exhausted mother. One of the daughters, Yi Wan encounters Du Xiao Fei, a hotshot attorney with ties to gangsters.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Mom is disappointed everyone forgot her birthday, but is delighted that her daughter An Qing came home with both her son and a secret.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: The family finally celebrates Mom's birthday. An Qing's money troubles lead her to meet a man.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: An Qing decides to invest in her father's organic farm, and Du Xiao Fei and Yi Wan start spending time together.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Qing Qing gets locked in her office building with her attractive, married boss. An Qing's money troubles compound when she needs to register Little Star for kindergarten.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: An Qing takes a new job and Little Star has trouble on his first day of school.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: An Qing has a torturous first day of work and Xiao Xi has a big announcement for the family on Christmas Eve.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: The family celebrates Christmas and finds out about Du Xiao Fei, while Qing Qing spends another late night with her boss.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: When he is teased at school for his father not being around, Little Star runs away from kindergarten to search for him.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Little Star is found, but An Qing still cannot bear to tell her mother what it was that made him run away.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: An Qing finds out that she was the one who inspired Qi Le's fortune. Yi Wan meets Du Xiao Fei's mother.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Yi Wan cries all night after her perceived rejection from Du Xiao Fei. Qing Qing defends her sister.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: The family has Mr. Chen over for dinner amid a terrible fight between Yi Wan and Qing Qing.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: The battle continues between Yi Wan and Qing Qing.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Yi Wan starts her reconciliation with Qing Qing and Du Xiao Fei.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Romance blooms as Du Xiao Fei dines with the family.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Romance blooms as Du Xiao Fei dines with the family.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Yi Wan and Qing Qing are closer than ever. An Qing gets called into work on her day off and bonds with Qi Fe.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Du Xiao Fei and Yi Wan find a baby at a laundromat. Qing Qing collapses at work and has to be taken to the hospital.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Qing Qing recovers from her illness. Crazy Dog Qin hatches a scheme to make Du Xiao Fei sick so Yi Wan will have to take care of him.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: While tending to Du Xiao Fei, Yi Wan shares an accidental kiss with him.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: The girls' cousin becomes Qing Qing's assistant. A colleague with a crush accidentally reveals Qing Qing's stomach ailment to Mom.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: While trying to mooch a gym membership from An Qing, a sneaky coworker tells Xiao Xi about the divorce. Xiao Xi drives herself crazy trying to keep the secret, but the wrong person overhears her. Yi Wan and Du Xiao Fei meet to try and come up with a plan to keep his mother from going overboard in planning a wedding for the shy couple.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Crazy Dog Qin and Du Xiao Fei's mother continue their meddling, as they force Yi Wan into trying on wedding dresses. Qi Le's sister visits him and the gym and reveals his long-held crush on An Qing. After Guang learns of the divorce, he struggles to find the right way to bring it up to An Qing.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: An Qing has a serious heart to heart discussion with her father, but they decide to keep it a secret from her mother, leaving Xiao Xi in a panic. An enemy of Du Xiao's famiily targets Yi Wan to enact his revenge.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Xiao Xi is still consumed with guilt over her revealing the truth about An Qing's divorce and enlists Yu Hang and Guang to keep it from their mother. Despite Crazy Dog Qin acting as Yi Wan's bodyguard, a rival gangster kidnaps them to get his revenge on Du Xiao Fei's family.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Yi Wan is kidnapped, but the devoted and determined Du Xiao Fei is in pursuit. Unaware of the peril of their children, Mrs. Du and the Li family meet, but her gangster background and forward nature leave them uneasy.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: After learning of the kidnapping, the parents forbid Yi Wan from seeing Du Xiao Fei just as they profess their true feelings for each other. Qing Qing's office mate finally makes his feelings known.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: In an attempt to distance himself from his feelings for Qing Qing, her boss tries avoiding her. Mom stubbornly tries to keep Xiao Fei and Yi Wan apart, as they look for a way to get her approval.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Mom finds out about Yi Wan skipping work to care for Xiao Fei and goes on a tirade leaving Yi Wan devastated. Xiao Fei and Yi Wan both enlist An Qing to help them reunite.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Mom finds out about Yi Wan skipping work to care for Xiao Fei and goes on a tirade leaving Yi Wan devastated. Xiao Fei and Yi Wan both enlist An Qing to help them reunite.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Yi Wan and Xiao enjoy a shopping date and endear themselves to Mrs. Du, with a thoughtful gift. Too bad Mom is so intend on setting up Yi Wan with another man, she comes along on the date.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Du Xiao Fei saves the day after the smitten blind date shows up at the kindergarten to court Yi Wan. Qing Qing gets a gift from her boss, but is it too generous a for subordinant to receive from a married man?

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: After a failed profession of love, Crazy Dog Qin enlists a group of family and friends to get Du Xiao Fei's approval. Qing Qing attends the office gala, but draws unwanted attention from a handsy client.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: After defending her honor, Qing Qing's boss confesses his feelings for her and it's up to her decide the right thing to do. Yi Wan seems unaware that she has set up a second date with her mother's secret suitor.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: When Mrs. Li's suitor takes Yi Wan out and wants to officially date her, Mr. Li meets with Xiao Fei to get the truth about his family. Qing Qing's boss asks her to go on a business trip with him, could this be the start of an affair?

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Xiao Fei successfully intercepts Wasir's advances and has a lovely date with Yi Wan. But the sisters and Yu Hang have to team up when Xiao Xi catches her boyfriend cheating on her.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Qing Qing gives into temptation and sets off on the business trip with her married boss. Xiao Fei declares war on Wasir to win Yi Wan's heart.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: On their business trip, Qing Qing and her boss bond over room service, can hanky-panky be far behind? Yu Hang confronts Xiao Xi's cheating ex-boyfriend and Little Star calls "Daddy" to come visit him at school.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: The family celebrates Xiao Xi getting over her breakup and Mrs. Li runs into Du Xiao Fei, will this lead to her approving the relationship?

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Xiao Fei and Yi Wan get some dubious romantic advice. With the support of her sister and father, An Qing prepares to tell her mother about the divorce.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Mrs. Li reluctantly gives Yi Wan and Xiao Fei's relationship her temporary approval. In preparation to drop the news of her divorce, An Qing tells Yi Wan, and Mr. Li creates a secret support group.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: The day has finally come, An Qing is ready to reveal the news of the divorce to her mother. The family and friends all brace for the worst.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Papa Li's Little Angels Taskforce is on the job to make sure that everything is okay after An Qing finally tells her mother about her divorce. When everything goes well, a celebration dinner is arranged with the male suitors of the family all in attendance.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Qi Le escorts Little Star as his father for Father-Child day at kindergarten. Qing Qing's "business trip" does not go well.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Qing Qing takes a day off after her business trip ends differently than she had hoped. Xiao Xi must take a make-up exam that she cannot concentrate for.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Yi Wan and Crazy Dog Qin are troubled by the news of Xiao Fei's mother getting sick. Qing Qing tries to end things with her boss.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Mrs. Li catches Xiao Fei defending Yi Wan from a bullying parent, and gives her approval. After speaking with An Qing, Qing Qing feels guilty about being the 'other woman.'

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: It's New Years and Mrs. Li agrees to officially meet with the Du family. This is great news for Yi Wan, since she and Xiao Fei are engaged!

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Mrs. Li spends the day with Qi Le, An Qing, and Little Star and encourages Qi Le to pursue An Qing. Meanwhile Mr. Li recruits a group to prepare a special surprise. Qing Qing and her boss rekindle their affair.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: The parents have their official meeting, will Mrs. Li finally accept Xiao Fei and Mrs. Du? Shan Ming confronts Qing Qing about the affair and Qi Le sets a time for his race with An Qing.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: With the engagment official, Yi Wan gets homesick over the fact she has to leave her family. Qi Le and An Qing have their footrace to determine the future of their relationship. Will Qi Le finally win his dream goddess and become a father to Little Star?

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Yi Wan gets an early start at becoming the perfect wife. Xiao Xi's close friendship with her friend Mi Mi raises her parents' eyebrows. Mrs. Li and Mrs. Du start to butt heads over the wedding plans.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: As Mrs. Du and Mrs. Li reach a compromise over the wedding planning, Yi Wan drives herself crazy wondering about her future as a wife. An Qing learns Qing Qing's secret.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: An Qing confronts Qing Qing about her affair. Talk of the honeymoon and having children makes Yi Wan nervous all over again.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Jealous loams as Ji Kuan's wife returns and gets suspicious of Qing Qing. Yu Hang's relationship with a fellow teacher stirs up Xiao Xi's feelings for him.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Yi Wan tries her hand at cooking for Xiao Fei. The Li family attempts to learn more about Yu Hangs new girlfriend. Guilt consumes both Qing Qing and Ji Kuan. A run-in with a jealous classmate brings An Qing and Qi Le closer.45:42:00

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: The wedding is finally here! It's a bittersweet time as Yi Wan says her heartfelt goodbyes to her mother and sisters. Meanwhile, Qi Le prepares his mother to meet An Qing.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: The wedding continues as Xiao Fei must pass several challenges to see his bride. The wedding is all set to go, if Mrs. Li and Yi Wan could just stop crying! Qi Le's sisters try to persuade their mother to accept An Qing, but she stubbornly refuses.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: On their first day of marriage, Yi Wan and Xiao Fei learn more about each other and fall deeper in love. Qi Le's mother continues to oppose their relationship and even confronts An Qing at work to tell her to stay away.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: Yi Wan and Xiao Fei enjoy their honeymoon to his hometown. Mr. Li and Crazy Dog Qin overreact when they see Yu Hang's lady friend with another man. When Mrs. Li finds out about Xiao Xi's crush on Yu Hang, she gives the sisters a lesson on marriage.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Qing Qing is paralyzed by guilt over her affair and refuses help from anyone. Qi Le and An Qing have Jerry sleep over at his apartment to win over his mother with cuteness.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Jerry wins over Mrs. Chen, but she still sticks to her old-fashioned beliefs about single mothers. Qing Qing has a rough day at the office despite Shan Ming's best attempts to help her. Could he slowly win her away from the affair?

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Qing Qing still can't figure out what do about the affair. Meanwhile, Xiao Xi is knitting a man's vest, is it intended for Yu Hang? And why does Yi Wan keep calling home when she's supposed to be enjoying her honeymoon.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Qing Qing's affair reaches a breaking point, when Hui Qi finds out, Shan Ming confronts Ji Kuan, and Qing Qing considers resigning.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Ji Kuan tells his wife he's back, but can he remain faithful? Meanwhile, Yi Wan leaves her honeymoon early, it's up to her sisters, her mother-in-law, and Xiao Fei to figure out why.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Qing Qing finally works up the courage to quit, but Hui Qi has some words for her.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: Qing Qing tells her family about quitting her job, but she still can't help but offer assistance from home. Meanwhile, Ji Kuan continues to torment his wife and Momoko.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: While at the bar with Yu Hang and Xiao Fei, Ji Kuan reveals the state of his marriage and his affair with Qing Qing. Xiao Xi and Yu Hang have been meeting up late at night.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: An Qing runs into Mrs. Chen while shopping and joins them for dinner, learning that mahjong is the way to win her over. Hui Qi comes over to beg Qing Qing to come back to work.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: After playing mahjong with Mrs. Chen, An Qing is closer to being with Qi Le, but she continues to get mysterious phone calls.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: Ji Kuan and Hui Qi finally get a separation, leaving Qing Qing feeling conflicted. After feeling sick all day, Yi Wan rushes to the doctor.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Yi Wan's symptoms all point to pregnancy! Qing Qing goes back to Ji Kuan, only to have An Qing directly confront her.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Feeling overwhelmed by her feelings and her fight with An Qing, Qing Qing skips town. Madam Jiao is way too excited about Yi Wan's pregnancy.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Mrs. Li and Madam Jiao create a huge fuss over Yi Wan's pregnancy, but is she the only pregnant member of the Li family?

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Qing Qing enjoys her time farming in the country with Shan Ming and his grandmother. Despite Mr. and Mrs. Li's utter refusal to except Xiao Xi and Yu Hang's relationship and pregnancy, Yu Hang proposes marriage.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: Though still furious at the situation, Mr. and Mrs. Li start to warm up at the idea of another grandchild.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: The mysterious stranger lurking around the Li home reveals himself to be Jerry's father, who shows up at the gym right before Qi Le's proposal.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: Jerry's father is revealed to have spent time in prison, and his appearance makes things difficult for Jerry and Qi Le. The guys conspire to get Mr. Li to sit down with Yu Hang.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: After Momoko is interrogated by Mr. and Mrs. Li, Qing Qing returns from her vacation to end things officially with Ji Kuan.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Yu Hang has his meeting with the ethics committee and Xiao Xi plans a stunt to support him which may backfire on the both of them.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: Jerry's dad bribes and manipulates trying to insert himself back into the family. An unstable Hui Qi visits and reveals the entire affair to the family, causing Mrs. Li to have a breakdown.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Upset with all the recent events, Mrs. Li runs away. Can the family find her before Jerry's birthday?

84.title: The Sweet Home
84.plot: In this final episode, how will things end for the Li Family? Jerry's father still wants to take him back to America, Yu Hang and Xiao Xi still haven't gotten the approval of the parents, and An Qing still hasn't accepted Qi Le's proposal. Will the family prevail in living a life of happiness?

imdb.title: Dear Mom
plot: Feng-Yi ('Hsueh-Feng Lu' (qv)) is a self-sacrificing mother who works tirelessly to support her four grown daughters in their life endeavors.
